name: Chuk's Roots
description:
The tale of Chuk continues in this sequel to Chuk'd In Space!

Controls:

Move WASD or Arrow Keys

Attack, Pick up & Throw
Space, CTRL, or J

How to play:

You have to beat the boss at the top of the arena! The only way to damage him is to throw Gooeys (the cute little creatures) at him. Punch them three times and you will be able to pick up and throw them.

Make sure to be wary of your surroundings and dodge the swarm of bullets headed your way, or you will lead Chuk's life to a grim conclusion.

Credits:

IsacDee - Programming
Manaspurt - Art
Mcfluff - Sound, Music
